      • randomSplit

        public static void randomSplit(java.io.File[] files,
               java.lang.String key)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Performs a random split on the datassets.
        Parameters:
        files - the files to use in the experiment
        key - the statistic to evaluate on, eg "Accuracy"
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if experiment fails for some reason

        Parameters:
        files - the files to use in the experiment

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Performs random split and cross-validation experiment on the datasets provided as arguments.
        Parameters:
        args - the stats key and datasets to use in the experiment
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if experiment fails for some reason
